original_text: The Lord says, ‘My people are fools. They do not know me. They are like children who do not know anything. They understand nothing. They are very clever at doing evil things. But they do not know how to do what is good.’ Jeremiah's vision The Lord says, ‘My people are fools. They do not know me. They are like children who do not know anything. They understand nothing. They are very clever at doing evil things. But they do not know how to do what is good.’ Jeremiah's vision The Lord says,
korean_text: 내 백성은 나를 알지 못하는 어리석은 자요 지각이 없는 미련한 자식이라 악을 행하기에는 지각이 있으나 선을 행하기에는 무지하도다

sentences.original_text: They are like children who do not know anything
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 아무것도 알지 못하는 어린 아이 같도다

sentences.original_text: They are very clever at doing evil things
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 악한 일을 하는 데에는 지혜롭도다

sentences.original_text: But they do not know how to do what is good
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 선한 일을 하는 법을 알지 못하느니라
